turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of pizza's would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to orders three large pepperoni pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With thick crashed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, do you want just pepperoni for all 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, any other special requests for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have thick crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, can i interest you in bella luna's house marinara dipping sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me add that to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the price will be $75, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and would you like to dine-in, or have delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Delivery, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me confirm your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large, thick crust pepperoni pizzas with a side of marinara dipping sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be delivered within 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
